Heartless Angel Ver. 2.5 Alpha is here!

Have fun playing ^^

Edit:

Some nasty Bug got reported:

When summoning a monster, and that summon dies.

The game will lock up and show a error.

Please don´t use normal summons on the Kraken boss, 

BUT Lucifer is needed, wait till a fix is made for the weaker summons.

Sorry for the trouble, shit happends in alpha demos, hope you still enjoy the game.

The minor summons are relative useless in there alpha stage anyway.

In the future they will all have roles and special buffs and abilitys.

Making them useful allies to aid you in battle.

xoxo, the dev , Heartless Angel
